name: LOCKTHERE
description:
-Description -

You are a werewolf, and you have faced lots of missions. However, everything changed of a sudden.  After go to the nearest village, you will see this is a village of machines. They live in houses made by humans. But the humans are all gone. After having a conversation with the "strange villager". They ask you to help them clear the slimes at the Northeast of the village. In order to go back home, you accept the mission...

-Features-
· Two weapons you can switch around, each of them has a different movement function

· Slime enemies and Slime boss.

· Cool combated music

-Bio-

I'm a student still study at New Zealand Media Design School now. This is a game about a character I designed a long time ago. Hope you enjoy the game. I'm still developing the game. I'd like to hear feedback.
